verses.name: Joshua 2:15
verses.text: Then she let them down by a cord through the window: for her house was upon the town wall, and she dwelt upon the wall.

verses.name: Joshua 2:16
verses.text: And she said unto them, Get you to the mountain, lest the pursuers meet you; and hide yourselves there three days, until the pursuers be returned: and afterward may ye go your way.

verses.name: Joshua 2:17
verses.text: And the men said unto her, We will be blameless of this thine oath which thou hast made us swear.
